name: Verum Interactive Starmap
description: An interactive starmap for Arcadum's world of Verum. Art is by Yowto with permission.

name: Web Email Client
description: Basically a Gmail/Outlook Clone architected with NodeJS and Express, etc. to help me learn more about Full-Stack Development and best practices for production.

name: Personal Portfolio Website
description: My personal website has been created by me; however, it is not-responsive and it is sorely out of date so I am currently deciding between 4 designs for the website, 3 of them based on Bootstrap 4.

name: Why don't people format their numbers browser extension
description: I created a Google Chrome browser extension using JavaScript to help me read large, especially unformatted numbers.

name: Personal Homelab Server
description: I owned, maintained, and administered an old Dell Poweredge R710 Server that I purchased from E-bay. I deployed the server in my home running Proxmox VE as it was a free and flexible environment which I utilized to learn more about server administration/management.

name: First ML - Ai plays Snake
description: My first Machine Learning Project, a failed attempt to make the computer play snake.

name: PyChessbot
description: A program to play chess architected with the PyGame framework and written in Python, originally built for the APCSP 2019 Create Task
